name: Astronite
overview: Take control of the brave explorer Astronite in this 1bit metroidvania and explore a huge map with different zones full of hidden secrets. Fight many different enemies, explore platforming areas and defeat big bosses that will stand in your way. Your goal is clear: eliminate the invasive species from your home planet. - A great map full of secrets. - Crowd of enemies and big bosses. - Echo Doors: challenges only available to the most intrepid. - Improve your skills with power-ups hidden on the map. - Original soundtrack created by zeeWave Sound.
